donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr:
1. Number and % of health facilities providing free anti-malarial drugs (equivalent number of health facilities will be provided)
2. No. of communities (villages, nomadic groups, settled IDP camps) have access to ACTs through HMM programme
3. No. of dispensaries using (free) RDTs for malaria diagnosis
4. Number of anti malaria drug quality studies conducted
5. % anti-malarial drugs of confirmed good quality
6. Number and % of localities with at least 4 malaria control staff trained
7. No. of localities with warehouse having adequate storage conditions  
8. Number and % of localities with standard procurement and supply system in place
9. Number of health service providers trained in laboratory techniques, PSM, IVM, epidemic control, HMM, and treatment of cases (doctors, nurses, lab technicians, medical assistants)
10. Number of public health officers completing training in medical entomology and vector control
11. Number of cases of uncomplicated and severe malaria receiving anti-malarial treatment according to National guidelines
12. No. of ITNs distributed
13. No. of schools delivering BCC messages to students
14. No. of national TV and radio broadcasters delivering BCC messages

project_descr: Scaling up Malaria Intervention (SIM) in Northern Sudan
